enchantment.ultimate_enchantment.last_st: §dWhen the health value is less than one-third, it provides you with 5% armor value and armor toughness for each level,§eand this gain is multiplied by each other
enchantment.ultimate_enchantment.over_gr: Each level provides you with a maximum health of 2%
When dealing critical damage, it will heal you based on the critical damage value and your maximum health
enchantment.ultimate_enchantment.ultimat: §dEach level increases §eall other enchantments §don this item by 1 level
enchantment.ultimate_enchantment.life_st: Each level provides 2% of life steal
enchantment.ultimate_enchantment.smeltin: Automatically smelting ore and dropping corresponding experience
enchantment.ultimate_enchantment.critica: Each level provides a 5% critical strike chance for the weapon
Each level provides 10% critical strike damage to the weapon
enchantment.ultimate_enchantment.pierce_: Each level provides 2 armor penetrations for weapons
enchantment.ultimate_enchantment.cut_dow: When dealing melee damage, every 1% increase in the target's current health compared to your maximum health will cause an additional 0.01% of final damage per level, up to a maximum of 10% per level
enchantment.ultimate_enchantment.quick_s: Each level provides a 10% charging speed
